value:
$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|Ah! U-Ursula...$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|My, my, if it isn't Nino. What a
surprise that someone like you
was invited to Khadein as well.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|Speak your mind, child. But do
remember that we are bound, so
fighting is sadly not an option.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|I don't want to fight. I just want to
know... Why did you—no, why did
Sonia do such terrible things?$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|That's a question better answered by
Lady Sonia herself. I am but a servant
of her absolute perfection.$k$pIs that all, then? I will take my leave.
Why don't you stay out of my way,
hm? For both of our sakes.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|...$k$p

$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|So, those who wish to wield
Khadein's most powerful magics must
use the sacred orbs.$k$pTsk, I suppose my hands are tied.
Forgive my failure, Lady Sonia...$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|Ursula.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|Oh, it's you. I seem to recall kindly
encouraging you to stay out of my
way earlier.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|You said... Sonia is perfect, right?
She told me that too, that she is
perfect and I am worth nothing.$k$pBut I don't understand. How can
someone judge whether another
person has value or not like that?$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|I couldn't do much, so I studied and
practiced my hardest so that I could
be of more use.$k$pI thought that maybe if I studied, then
I might learn what you and Sonia
meant by "perfection."$k$pBut the more I studied, the less I
understood.$k$pThe world is complicated and big, so
what seems useless here might be
useful someplace else.$k$pYou just have to make the connection.
So, there isn't anything that has zero
value. I think that goes for people too.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|I'm astonished. What a shame that
you could study so hard only to
arrive at such a naive conclusion.$k$pIt's laughable to think that you could
ever reach Lady's Sonia's level. You
will always be garbage.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|Wh-what?$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|The summoner seems to prefer those
sentimental ideals, which is too bad.
But that's what sets me apart.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|Ursula, you know you'll end up all
alone if you keep talking like that,
don't you?$k$p$WmMPID_カダインウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Khadein,Face|What's the loss in that? As long as I
have Lady Sonia and keep striving for
perfection, what else would I need?$k$pAre we done here? Talking with you
is a waste of energy.$k$p$WmMPID_カダインニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_Khadein,Face|Hey, wait! ...She's gone.$k$pWhat a lonely person. I wonder if
that's why she needs Sonia so badly.
I guess I know the feeling...$k$pIt makes me sad, but I think I
understand Ursula a little better now.$k$p
